fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Budget, Trade, Competition, International co-operation and development, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Research and innovation, External Relations, Food Safety, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
climate change, energy, r&d, steel action plan  
competition, trade, circular economy, digital single market
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Tata Steel in Europe is a member of UK Steel/EEF, CBI, VNO-NCW, FME, VNMI, VEMW, ICC, Eurofer, Apeal
goals__remit: The European operations of Tata Steel comprise Europe's second largest steel producer. With main steelmaking operations in the UK and the Netherlands, they supply steel and related services to the construction, automotive, packaging, material handling and other demanding markets worldwide. Tata Steel is one of the world’s top 15 steel producers. The combined group has an aggregate crude steel capacity of more than 28 million tonnes and approximately 80,000 employees across four continents. Tata Steel's mission is to build the leading European steel business that is sustainable in every sense.
